title: How to Select Surface Subsets via GetObject Without Ctrl Key?
question:
In some scenarios, I need users to select only a subset of a surface.

Setting 
get.SubObjectSelect = true;
 when calling the 
GetObject
 method allows this functionality. However, I want to enable direct selection without requiring the user to press the Ctrl key. How can this be achieved? Thank you!

code_blocks.code:
import Rhino

go = Rhino.Input.Custom.GetObject()
go.SetCommandPrompt("Select a brep face")
go.SubObjectSelect = True
go.DisablePreSelect()
go.GeometryFilter = Rhino.DocObjects.ObjectType.Surface
go.GetMultiple(1,0)
code_blocks.author: clement

code_blocks.code:
import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs

obj_ref = rs.GetObject("Surface", 8, False, False, None, subobjects=True)
